channel.title: News RSS feed - Indie DB
channel.description: Subscribe to the Indie DB news feed, and get the latest updates as they are posted.

item.title: Paradox 0.2.4 Released
item.description: The new version of Paradox contains a new GUI system, new textures, and features including the ability to walk on walls.
The new version of Paradox contains a new GUI system, new textures, and features including the ability to walk on walls.

media:content.media:description: The new version of Paradox contains a new GUI system, new textures, and features including the ability to walk on walls.

item.title: Keeping your house in order.
item.description: In a previous blog post I mentioned that we spent a few weeks of reasonably intense prototyping to try to help us get a handle on what we want Friendship Club to be. Up until that point the game design was still a little under debate and we were unsure where to put the design emphasis. It was largely a question of how much from the basic game experience did we want to deviate and how did we want to present those options.

In a previous blog post I mentioned that we spent a few weeks of reasonably intense prototyping to try to help us get a handle on what we want Friendship Club to be. Up until that point the game design was still a little under debate and we were unsure where to put the design emphasis. It was largely a question of how much from the basic game experience did we want to deviate and how did we want to present those options.

media:content.media:title: Keeping your house in order.

Up until that point the game design was still a little under debate and we were unsure where to put the design emphasis. It was largely a question of how much from the basic game experience did we want to deviate and how did we want to present those options.

item.title: Historical Armor & Interview with the team
item.description: Hello everyone, today we have a new video regarding historical accuracy for our armors. We also have an interview with the team made by MiddleEasy.
